Description: Electronically sign, and now prepare, act on, and manage agreements to deliver great experiences for your customers and employees.
Name: DocuSign

Methods.Name: Get Templates
Methods.Description: Returns all Templates attached to account

Methods.Name: Get User Info
Methods.Description: Returns account information and the base_uri needed to interact with the core DocuSign API service.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Returns all users for the specified account

Methods.Name: List New Envelope Status Changes
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of envelopes that match your request whose status has changed since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Envelope Status Changes
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of envelopes that match your request. You must include one or more of the following parameters: From Date, Envelope ID's, Transaction ID's.

Methods.Name: Send Envelope
Methods.Description: Creates and sends an envelope from a template created on the docusign website.

Methods.Name: Get Envelope
Methods.Description: Retrieves the overall status for the specified envelope.

Methods.Name: List Groups
Methods.Description: Returns all groups for an account.

Methods.Name: List Group Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of users in a group.

Methods.Name: List Organizations Users
Methods.Description: Returns all users in the organization.
